name: Agent Shield Technologies
overview:
Agent Shield is a FREE, patent pending, web 2.0 technology that makes it easy and safe for REALTORS to sell new construction properties.

Quick Stats: â€¢REALTORS are the #1 sales force for real estate. â€¢REALTORS, depending on geographical location, account for 51 to over 90% of new construction sales. â€¢Less than 1% of REALTORS actively promote, market and sell new construction properties.

The majority of REALTORS do not benefit from selling new construction because of the following barriers: 1.Lack of access: New construction properties/developments are typically not in the MLS. 2.New Construction was difficult to market: REALTORS did not have access to promotional material that was easy to distribute.
3.High risk of being cut out of the transaction: There were no mechanism to provide a level of compensation protection.

Solution: Agent Shield provides the whole REALTOR community with the opportunity and benefits of selling new construction properties.

Easy access to new construction: We do all the work of signing up new developments into the Agent Shield Network. REALTORS are provided with FREE widgets with new construction properties to add to their current website which easily provide access for their clients and prospects.

Easy to market new construction: With 84% of buyers researching real estate online, Agent Shield allows the REALTORâ€™s prospects to continue performing their own research. Powered by Agent Shieldâ€™s technology, the REALTORâ€™s prospects are directed (through the widget on their website or via emails) to the actual new developmentâ€™s website to research and learn more about the development.

Safe to market new construction: The referring REALTOR retains full control of their prospect/lead. When the prospect arrives at the new developmentâ€™s website, Agent Shieldâ€™s technology automatically changes all of the contact information to the referring REALTORâ€™s. All emails sent from the contact forms go to the referring REALTOR. The developer does not receive the leadâ€™s information.

Opens up 2nd home market to REALTORS: Most areas are feeders markets for other areas. For example, New York is the top feeder market for SW Florida. Agent Shield provides REALTORS with access to new developments around the world thus opening the opportunity for the REALTOR to continue servicing their clients who are looking to purchase a second home elsewhere. Servicing the second home buyer is easy. Agent Shield provides the new developmentâ€™s website as a research tool for the buyer.

Agent Shield will revolutionize the way new construction properties are marketed by REALTORS on the internet. Every REALTOR can now easily expand their inventory offerings and benefit from selling new construction. Agent Shield is FREE for REALTORS. More information and a 80 second video of how Agent Shield works can be found at www.AgentShield.com.
